typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ï»¿"Nombre"} as string,
		{F. Ini} as timestamp 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		{F. Ter} as timestamp 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		{m3 Real} as double,
		{m3 Prg} as string,
		{mm Real} as string,
		{mm Prg} as string,
		{T. Oper} as string,
		Huerto as string,
		Sectores as string,
		Fertirrigado as string,
		cc1 as string,
		cc2 as string,
		cc3 as string,
		cc4 as string,
		cc5 as string,
		cc6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Segmento = {ï»¿"Nombre"},
		FechaInicial = {F. Ini},
		FechaTermino = {F. Ter},
		m3Real = {m3 Real},
		{T. Oper}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Seleccionar1
